title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Mix eggs and cheese in a bowl.
Combine spaghetti, bacon, and egg mixture while warm.
Season with black pepper and serve.
instructions: Boil water in a large pot.
Add salt and cook spaghetti until al dente.
Cook bacon until crispy in a separate pan.
Mix eggs and Parmesan cheese in a bowl.
Combine spaghetti, bacon, and egg mixture while still warm.
